Class-Monk 20 -- Female Half-Orc Monk: 20
Strength: 18 (+4) Dexterity: 20 (+5) Constitution: 18 (+4) Intelligence: 18 (+4) Wisdom: 18 (+4) Charisma: 18 (+4)
Background: Acolyte Alignment: Neutral Good Deity: Shelyn (NG)
Experience: 19500/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 55 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Ability Notes:
Ability Boosts: Ability Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Incredible Movement: +30 Speed in no armor
Wall Run: (1) May Stride on vertical surfaces
Water Step: May Stride across liquids

Feature Notes:

General Feats: 5 selections
Half-Orc: Has the Low-Light Vision feature
Human Heritage: 1 selection
Ki Tradition: 1 selection

Monk Key Ability: 1 selection
Orc Sight: Has the Darkvision feature
Path To Perfection: 2 selections
Second Path To Perfection: +1 selection
Skill Feats: 10 selections
Third Path To Perfection: 1 selection
Adopted Ancestry (Halfling): May take Halfling ancestry feats
Darkvision: Has normal b/w vision in darkness and dim light
Low-Light Vision: Has normal vision in dim light
Ride: Automatically succeeds when using Command an Animal to move/Mount acts on self turn
Timeless Body: Does not age
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)

Abadar Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Folktale Lore: +26 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +4 (charisma; untrained)

Assurance (Gnome Lore): May forgo rolling a Gnome Lore check for an automatic 32
Crane Stance: (1) Unarmored stance gives -5 jump DC and +2'/+5' vertical/horizontal Leap
Dancing Leaf: +5' Jump and Leap/Takes no damage from falling when adjacent to a wall
Group Impression: May use Diplomacy to Make an Impression with 2 targets
Student Of The Canon: Critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Failures to Recall Knowledge about own faith are successes, and successes are critical successes
Tongue Of Sun And Moon: Can speak and understand all spoken languages
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 43 (dexterity; legendary) Class DC: Monk: 41 (dexterity; master)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Dart (+31 1d4+4 P R20'; dexterity; master); Fist (+31 1d6+4 B; dexterity; master); Sling (+31 1d6+2 B R50'; dexterity; master); Staff (+30 1d4+4 B [2h d8]; strength; master)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Expert Strikes: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Graceful Legend: Defense Legendary (Unarmored Defense)/Class Master (Monk)
Graceful Mastery: Defense Master (Unarmored Defense)
Greater Weapon Specialization: Increased Weapon Specialization effects
Ironblood Surge: (1) Ironblood Stance resistance increases to 4
Master Strikes: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Monastic Weaponry: Attack Master (Monk Weapons)
Monk Expertise: Class Expert (Monk)
Powerful Fist: Fists inflict 1d6 HP damage
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Expertise: Attack Master (Bastard Sword)
Unconventional Weaponry: Treats Bastard Sword as one category simpler
Weapon Proficiency (Bastard Sword): Attack Trained (Bastard Sword)
Adamantine Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as adamantine weapons
Arrow Snatching: After a successful Deflect Arrow, may use the projectile to make an immediate ranged Strike
Brawling Focus: May use the critical specialization effects of trained monk weapons and brawling weapons
Crane Flutter: (R) While in Crane Stance, may gain +3 Armor Class vs. a melee Strike; a miss allows an immediate -2 Strike
Crane Stance: (1) Unarmored stance gives +1 Armor Class and restricts attacks to 1d6 HP bludgeoning hand Unarmed Strikes
Crushing Grab: May inflict 4 HP bludgeoning, lethal or non-lethal, with a successful Grapple
Deflect Arrow: (R) May gain +4 Armor Class vs. a physical ranged Strike
Diamond Fists: Unarmed Strikes gain the forceful trait or increase damage by 1 die step
Disrupt Ki: (2) May inflict 3d6 HP persistent negative damage and enfeebled 1 with an Unarmed Strike
Dragon Roar: (1) R15' Bellowing while in Dragon Stance inflicts frightened 1 on foes 1/1d4 rd (DC 26 Will negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 2); first successful self Strike in the next rd on a frightened foe inflicts +4 HP
Dragon Stance: (1) Unarmored stance allows leg Unarmed Strikes that inflict 1d10 HP bludgeoning and ignoring first square of difficult terrain when Striding
Enduring Quickness: May use an additional action each rd to Stride, Leap, or Jump
Flurry Of Blows: (1) May make 2 Unarmed Strikes 1/turn
Flurry Of Maneuvers: May use Flurry Of Blows to Grapple, Shove, or Trip
Flying Kick: (2) May Strike a foe at the end of a Leap or Jump
Fuse Stance: Has merged two known stances into a unique new stance that grants the effects of both
Guarded Movement: +4 Armor Class vs. movement reactions
Impossible Technique: (R) May force a foe reroll on a hit or to gain a reroll on a failed save
Improved Knockback: Successful Shove moves 5' (critical success 10') and allows following; pushing into an obstacle inflicts 10 HP bludgeoning
Ironblood Stance: (1) Unarmored stance allows Unarmed Strikes that inflict 1d8 HP bludgeoning and gives resistance 5 to all damage
Ironblood Surge: (1) When in Ironblood Stance, may gain +1 Armor Class for 1 rd
Knockback Strike: (2) May Shove 5' with a successful Unarmed Strike
Master Of Many Styles: (F) May enter a stance at the beginning of a turn
Metal Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as cold iron and silver weapons
Mixed Maneuver: (2) May attempt 2 choices of Grapple, Shove, and Trip simultaneously
Mountain Quake: (1) R20' Stomp inflicts 4 HP and fall prone (DC 41 Fort HP only) 1/1d4 rd
Mountain Stance: (1) Unarmored stance gives +1 Armor Class, +2 vs. Shove and Trip, and -5 Speed and restricts attacks to 1d8 HP bludgeoning hand Unarmed Strikes
Mountain Stronghold: (1) While in Mountain Stance, may gain +2 Armor Class for 1 rd
Mystic Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magic weapons
Orc Ferocity: (R) May retain 1 Hit Point when brought to 0 Hit Points 1/day
Perfected Form: Rolls of less than 10 on first Strike each turn are treated as 10s
Powerful Fist: Suffers no attack penalty for inflicting lethal damage with unarmed attacks
Shattering Strike: (2) May make an Unarmed Strike that bypasses target resistances and ignores half of target's Hardness
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, may negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Sleeper Hold: (1) May use Grapple to inflict clumsy 1 for 1 turn (critical success unconscious for 1 min)
Stance Savant: (F) May enter a stance during initiative
Stand Still: (R) May Strike an adjacent moving foe
Stunning Fist: May inflict stunned 1 with a successful Flurry Of Blows (DC 41 Fort negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 3)
Swift River: (F) May end one Speed status penalty or condition at end of each turn
Tangled Forest Rake: (1) May move target 5' into a space within reach with a successful Tangled Forest Stance Strike
Tangled Forest Stance: (1) Unarmored stance allows Unarmed Strikes that inflict 1d8 HP slashing and prevents foes from moving away (DC 41 Reflex, Acrobatics, or Athletics negates)
Tiger Slash: (2) While in Tiger Stance, may inflict +3 damage dice and a 5' push; critical success inflicts +4 HP persistent bleed damage
Tiger Stance: (1) Unarmored stance allows 10' Steps and hand Unarmed Strikes that inflict 1d8 HP slashing, plus 1d4 HP persistent bleed damage on critical success
Weapon Specialization: +4/+6/+8 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Whirling Throw: (1) A successful Athletics vs. a grabbed or restrained foe's Fortitude DC allows throwing it 30', inflicting up to 3d6+4 HP bludgeoning
Winding Flow: (1) May perform 2 choices of Stand, Step, and Stride
Wolf Drag: (2) While in Wolf Stance, may inflict 1d12 HP piercing and knocked prone
Wolf Stance: (1) Unarmored stance allows hand Unarmed Strikes that inflict 1d8 HP piercing, with the trip trait when flanking
Save: Fortitude: +28 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +33 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +30 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Reflex): Save Master (Reflex)
Path To Perfection (Reflex): Save Master (Reflex)
Path To Perfection (Will): Save Master (Will)
Third Path To Perfection (Reflex): Save Legendary (Reflex)
Diamond Soul: +1 vs. magic
Enlightened Presence: R15' Self and allies gain +2 Will vs. mental effects
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Path To Perfection (Reflex): Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Path To Perfection (Will): Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Third Path To Perfection (Reflex): Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures/Takes half damage on failed Reflex saves
Timeless Body: +2 vs. poisons and diseases/Resistance 10 to poison damage
Magic
Focus Points: 9 Attack: Occult: +30 (wisdom; master) Spell DC: Occult: 40 (wisdom; master)
Spells:
Abundant Step (O4 Con): (1) Allows caster to teleport 55' within line of sight
Empty Body (O9 Con): (2) Caster moves to the Ethereal Plane for 1 min
Ki Blast (O3 Evo): (1) 15' cone (2/3 actions give a 30'/60' cone) inflicts 2d6 HP force (2/3 actions inflicts 3d6/4d6 HP) (save Fortitude inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and 10' push) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP for 1 action or +2d6 HP for 2 or 3)
Ki Rush (O1 Tra): (1) Allows the caster to move twice and makes the caster concealed until next turn
Ki Strike (O1 Tra): (1) Gives the caster +1 attack and +1d6 HP force, lawful, negative, or positive with an unarmed Strike or Flurry Of Blows (heightened +4 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Quivering Palm (O8 Nec): (2) A successful Strike allows the caster to inflict stunned 3 and 80 HP on the target any time within 1 month (save Fortitude inflicts stunned 1 and 40 HP and ends the spell; critical success ends the spell; critical failure kills the target) (heightened +1 inflicts +10 HP, or +5 HP on a successful save)
Wholeness Of Body (O2 Nec): (1) Caster regains 8 HP or may attempt to counteract 1 poison or disease (heightened +1 restores +8 HP)
Wild Winds Stance (O4 Evo): (1) Caster may use R30' unarmed strikes to inflict 1d6 HP bludgeoning and gains +2 AC vs. ranged attacks until leaving the stance
Wind Jump (O5 Tra): (1) Caster gains 55' fly speed, ending each turn on the ground, for 1 min (heightened 6th caster may attempt a DC 30 Acrobatics to avoid falling at the end of turn)
Magic Notes:
Abundant Step: Knows the Abundant Step occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Empty Body: Knows the Empty Body occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Graceful Legend: Spell Master (Occult)
Ki Blast: Knows the Ki Blast occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Ki Rush: Knows the Ki Rush occult spell/Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Ki Strike: Knows the Ki Strike occult spell/Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Ki Tradition (Occult): Spell Trained (Occult)
Monk Expertise: Spell Expert (Occult)
Quivering Palm: Knows the Quivering Palm occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Wholeness Of Body: Knows the Wholeness Of Body occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Wild Winds Initiate: Knows the Wild Winds Stance occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Wind Jump: Knows the Wind Jump occult spell/+1 Focus Points
Elemental Fist: May inflict electricity, bludgeoning, fire, or cold damage with Ki Strike
Ki Tradition (Occult): May learn spells from the occult tradition
Meditative Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Meditative Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Wild Winds Gust: (2) May make a Wild Winds Stance Strike against all creatures in a 30' cone or 60' line
Notes
Validation Errors: Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 60 allocated
